casebody.data:
Carlos TREVINO, petitioner,
v.
Rick THALER, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 11-10189. Supreme Court of the United States April 1, 2013.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted. Warren A. Wolf, Esquire, of San Antonio, Texas, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
